sections.heading: Usage Tips
content: Use the conditional for polite speech, wishes, and unreal conditions.
Combine with 'gdyby' for clear if-then sentences.
Choose perfective verbs for completed hypothetical results and imperfective for ongoing or habitual hypotheticals.
Always adjust endings for gender and number.
Listen to native speakers to learn natural placement and nuance of 'by'.
